q: ''`` It has been said that insanity as doing the same thing over and over and expecting different results,'' replied the Bernie Sanders staff in an href="http://Bernie Sanders.senate.gov/graphics/Analysis_of_contractor_fraud_rpt.pdf" target="_hplink"> analysis of the findings. It is clear that DOD's current approach is not working, and we need a much more vigorous approach to dealing with contractor fraud. Bernie Sanders underscored the importance of reining in contractor abuse by pointing to the U.S. fiscal situation, saying that the deficit can not be reduced without looking at the waste, fraud and abuse in the Pentagon's budget

CBS News reports that Dodge-Chrysler is seriously rethinking minivans as an automotive form factor, and that the company plans to completely redesign the iconic American family hauler. We need to seriously rethink the minivan, said Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler, in a recent ABC interview.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Strong words from the company the popularized the minivan concept

`` By detaining journalists Aboubacar Sanogo and Yayoro Charles Lopez Kangb without due process, the Gbagbo government is violating the Ivorian constitution it is swearing to uphold in public,'' said CPJ Africa Advocacy Coordinator Mohamed Keita . We call on the administration of President Laurent Gbagbo to release these journalists, to halt mistreatment of them, and to investigate and bring to justice all those responsible for the reported abuse. href="http://allafrica.com/legalaffairs/"> Legal Affairs href="http://allafrica.com/humanrights/"> Human Rights Gbagbo has disputed the results of the November 2010 presidential runoff that showed Alassane Ouattara as the clear victor. In remarks to state lawmakers, Mike Pence called Mitch Daniels `` the best governor in America.'' Mike Pence says he's had as many people encourage him to consider coming home to Indiana as urging him to keep the national campaign. He says he still intends to make a decision by the end of January.

a fictitious substance called`` red mercury'' that, according to local lore, can be found in the throats of ancient mummies. Some people think it has magical powers and can be used to summon spirits. They live thinking about it. They could kill each other to get it, Zahi Hawass said.`` When I enter any place in Egypt, people ask me all the time about this.''
